PageTitle: display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te
FuncDef: The display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te command displays information about dynamic BFD for RSVP-TE sessions.
CLIs: display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te
display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specify to view the detailed information.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te
FEC                   DISC OUT IF          NEXTHOP         TUNNEL          STATE
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about RSVP-TE LSPs monitored by BFD, run the display mpls bfd session protocol rsvp-te command. The command output includes the destination address and outbound interface name of a RSVP-TE LSP, the local discriminator of the dynamic BFD session, and the status of an MPLS BFD session.
